email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The cargo size is 12,000 MT, and we are offering a lumpsum freight rate of USD 450,000.

Vessel Details:
- Name: PACIFIC WAVE
- DWT: 75,000
- LOA: 220m

Laycan is flexible, but we are aiming for a laytime start date of 2023-11-15. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria Lopez
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

Thank you for your offer. The lumpsum rate seems a bit high. Could you consider reducing it to USD 420,000? Also, can you confirm the laycan and provide the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Alex Wang

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Rate Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

We can adjust the lumpsum rate to USD 430,000. The laycan remains flexible, and the demurrage rate is USD 6,000 per day. Please confirm if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Maria Lopez

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Rate Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

USD 430,000 and a demurrage rate of USD 6,000 per day are acceptable. Please proceed with the booking for a laytime start date of 2023-11-15.

Best regards,
Alex Wang

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Booking is confirmed. We will send the final documents shortly.

Best regards,
Maria Lopez

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

Thank you for the confirmation. Looking forward to receiving the documents.

Best regards,
Alex Wang
